title: WTF so many bots in aram?
body:
Doing ARAM to level a new account and I shit you not every game I get into has bots. I can deal with it normally but this last one all 4 of my team mates were bots, they literally followed each other around in a little line at the start of the game and proceeded to die over and over.

Wtf is this man? Is this normal now?

replies.body: I am an avid ARAM player and this last week I have seriously had enough....Bots Bots Bots , I have experienced all of the above and below...RIOT sort it out or at least tell us what's happening in regards to this !!!!

The fact that Riot doesn't reply to anything is here disgusts me.

I want to spend money on this game but I see no reason to encourage my spending money here at this stage.

Seems like they have no interest and are happy to just let OCE rot

Just report them at the end of the game and move on. It's sad that people actively make bots and put them into games with humans, but it's a reality. Usually, you don't see this as you get better at the game.
